Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 16 Micchattaniyatattika » 16.1 Paṭiccavāra » 16.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 16.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Naadhipati
Micchattaniyatattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naadhipati
9.
2277Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—  micchattaniyate khandhe paṭicca micchattaniyatādhipati. (1)
2278Sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—  sammattaniyate khandhe paṭicca sammattaniyatādhipati. (1)
2279Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—  aniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe…  asaññasattānaṃ…pe… . (1)
<< Naārammaṇaup Naanantara >>
